synopsis.text:
Some where in an alternate timeline of Japan, the Media Betterment Act has been enacted, leading to the formation of a military police force tasked with censoring all forms of media deemed harmful to society. To combat this oppressive regime, libraries have assembled their own military units known as the Library Defense Force (LDF), with an elite squad called the Library Task Force (LTF) leading the charge.

Enter Iku Kasahara, a young woman whose life is forever changed when an LDF agent saves her from the clutches of the Media Betterment Committee. Inspired by her hero, she joins the LDF and undergoes rigorous training under the watchful eye of her enigmatic instructor, Atsushi Doujou. Despite the challenges she faces, Kasahara's determination and athleticism ultimately earn her a spot in the prestigious LTF.

As a member of the LTF, Kasahara and her comrades wage a constant battle against censorship, protecting precious books and artifacts from the iron grip of the Media Betterment Act. Along the way, she discovers love, camaraderie, and the true meaning of fighting for what she believes in. Follow Kasahara's journey as she navigates the complexities of war, love, and comedy in this thrilling tale of freedom and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
